props.name: autoComplete
props.description: If true, the portion of the selected suggestion that has not been typed by the user will appear inline in the textbox

props.name: autoHighlight
props.description: If true, the first option is automatically highlighted

props.name: autoSelect
props.description: If true, the selected option becomes the value of the input when the Autocomplete loses focus

props.name: blurOnSelect
props.description: Control if the input should be blurred when an option is selected

props.name: clearIcon
props.description: The icon to display in place of the default clear icon

props.name: clearOnBlur
props.description: If true, the input's text is cleared on blur if no value is selected

props.name: clearOnEscape
props.description: If true, clear all values when the user presses escape and the popup is closed

props.name: clearText
props.description: Override the default text for the clear icon button

props.name: closeText
props.description: Override the default text for the close popup icon button

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value

props.name: disableClearable
props.description: If true, the input can't be cleared

props.name: disableCloseOnSelect
props.description: If true, the popup won't close when a value is selected

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the component is disabled

props.name: disabledItemsFocusable
props.description: If true, will allow focus on disabled items

props.name: disableListWrap
props.description: If true, the list box in the popup will not wrap focus

props.name: disablePortal
props.description: If true, the Popper content will be under the DOM hierarchy of the parent component

props.name: filterOptions
props.description: A function that determines the filtered options to be rendered on search

props.name: filterSelectedOptions
props.description: If true, hide the selected options from the list box

props.name: forcePopupIcon
props.description: Force the visibility display of the popup icon

props.name: freeSolo
props.description: If true, the Autocomplete is free solo, meaning that the user input is not bound to provided options

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: If true, the input will take up the full width of its container

props.name: getLimitTagsText
props.description: The label to display when the tags are truncated

props.name: getOptionDisabled
props.description: Used to determine the disabled state for a given option

props.name: getOptionLabel
props.description: Used to determine the string value for a given option

props.name: groupBy
props.description: If provided, the options will be grouped under the returned string

props.name: handleHomeEndKeys
props.description: If true, the component handles the Home and End keys

props.name: id
props.description: This prop is used to help implement the accessibility logic

props.name: includeInputInList
props.description: If true, the highlight can move to the input

props.name: inputValue
props.description: The input value

props.name: isOptionEqualToValue
props.description: Used to determine if the option represents the given value

props.name: limitTags
props.description: The maximum number of tags that will be visible when not focused

props.name: loading
props.description: If true, the component is in a loading state

props.name: loadingText
props.description: Text to display when in a loading state

props.name: multiple
props.description: If true, value must be an array and the menu will support multiple selections

props.name: noOptionsText
props.description: Text to display when there are no options

props.name: onChange
props.type: (event: React.SyntheticEvent, value: T | T[], reason: AutocompleteChangeReason, details?: AutocompleteChangeDetails<T>) => void
props.description: Callback fired when the value changes

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback fired when the popup requests to be closed

props.name: onHighlightChange
props.type: (event: React.SyntheticEvent, option: T, reason: AutocompleteHighlightChangeReason) => void
props.description: Callback fired when the highlight option changes

props.name: onInputChange
props.type: (event: React.SyntheticEvent, value: string, reason: AutocompleteInputChangeReason) => void
props.description: Callback fired when the input value changes

props.name: onOpen
props.description: Callback fired when the popup requests to be opened

props.name: open
props.description: If true, the component is shown

props.name: openOnFocus
props.description: If true, the popup will open on input focus

props.name: openText
props.description: Override the default text for the open popup icon button

props.name: options
props.description: Array of options

props.name: PaperComponent
props.description: The component used to render the body of the popup

props.name: popupIcon
props.description: The icon to display in place of the default popup icon

props.name: readOnly
props.description: If true, the component becomes readonly

props.name: renderGroup
props.description: Render the group

props.name: renderInput
props.description: Render the input

props.name: renderOption
props.type: (props: React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLLIElement>, option: T, state: AutocompleteRenderOptionState) => React.ReactNode
props.description: Render the option

props.name: renderTags
props.description: Render the selected value

props.name: selectOnFocus
props.description: If true, the input's text is selected on focus

props.name: size
props.description: The size of the component

props.name: slotProps
props.description: The props used for each slot inside

props.name: value
props.description: The value of the autocomplete
